result.execSummary:
The defendant Anthony C. Donaldson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd-Degree Recklessly Endangering Safety, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.30(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees.
++  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
++  Defendant is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given..  May Not have contact with victim.  DOC shall promptly notify the court, in writing, of any new arrest or criminal charge made against the deft.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony C. Donaldson

records.addlTxt: Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty James Toran.  Victim rights compliance.  Sentencing arguments made.  Sentence w/held; placed on probation for 3yrs.  See conditions.  DNA ordered; written notice given to deft.  Appeal rights.  Firearm Warning.  Voting acknowledgment.  Bond to be applied towards financial obligations.  Balance may be returned to poster.  Court has no objection to an inter-state compact since the deft resides in Georgia.  If revoked, deft requests credit of 71 days.
From Agent Nolan

**** BOND HAS BEEN REVOKED - DEFENDANT TO REMAIN IN CUSTODY UNTIL FINAL DISPOSITION OF CASE ******

941.30(2) - 2nd degree recklessly endangering safety
Email sent to Agent Nolan with the new date/time of sentencing hrg
from deft's brother

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA James Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty James Toran.  Email received from agent - deft has been uncooperative w/PSI writer.  Discussion ensues.  Court revokes the deft's bond pending the sentencing hrg.  Deft taken into custody.  Sentencing hrg set for 1/11/17 @ 2:30pm.  Bond to be held pending disposition of the case.
Email received from Agent Nolan - deft not cooperative w/PSI writer

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty James Toran.  Victim rights compliance.  Case is not resolved.  Ludwig hrg held.  JS to remain on for 10/10/16 @ 9am.  CASE RECALLED.  Defense counsel reports the deft wishes to accept the plea offer - plead to the charge and the State recommend probation.  Court will allow the plea to proceed.  Deft pleads guilty to the charge; found guilty by the Court.  PSI ordered.  Sentencing set for 11/22/16 @ 10:30am.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Diane Caspari.  Atty James Toran also present.  Atty Toran now represents the deft.  Atty Caspari is allowed to w/draw.  Atty Caspari turned over all the discovery she had to Atty Toran in court today.  Atty Toran has conflict Aug 8th trial date.  FPT set for 9/23/16 @ 11am, JS 10/10/16 @ 9am
from Atty James Toran - received add'l monies to represent the deft
Jury selection on August 8, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Final pre-trial on July 21, 2016 at 10:30 am.
for Adjournment of Trial - filed by Atty Caspari
from Atty Toran - has been partially retained and is requesting an adjournment of the 6/6/16 trial date
No NOR has been filed; JS remains on for 6/6/16 @ 9am

State appears by ADA James Kraus. DE appears in person with Atty James Toran.   Clerk P. Scypta.   
MINUTES: 158 -  Atty Toran is new to this case and requests a brief adjournment to review. It is uncertain at this time whether Atty Toran will be on the case for JT. If a Notice of Retainer is filed by 5/26, the Court is willing to reschedule JT to allow time for review with DE. No change made to JT date or attorney of record at this time. (ps 5/18/16)

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Diane Caspari.  Defense counsel moves to w/draw per request of the deft; deft wishes to hire an atty.  Court w/holds any ruling on this motion until the deft has a new atty retained.  FPT set for 5/16/16 @ 2:15pm, JS 6/6/16 @ 9am
Copy of correspondence between attys - squad video has been turned over to defense
Additional discovery
Posted $2500 on 2/5/16
Scheduling Order

Defendant Anthony C. Donaldson appeared with Attorney Diane Rose Caspari.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JThwing. Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found. Bound over to Br 3.  Information filed, reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered. Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 7, 2016 at 01:30 pm.  Jury selection scheduled for April 25, 2016 at 09:00 am.
to Preliminary Hearing
